title: Changing the # of days to retain messages in account settings/disk space
content:
When I try to change the number of days messages are kept in my inbox (from the default of 30), I get a pop-up window warning me that this will permanently delete the messages and do I want to proceed (see screenshot).

While that pop-up window is up, I can't increase the # of days to retain messages. May I press "OK" and then adjust the number of days messages are retained? Or, if I press "OK" will that immediately delete all messages older than 30 days?

Thanks!

title: Thunderbird
content: Hi, perhaps my problem is not that unusual, but I'm finding it a bit difficult to solve. I have three email accounts on Thunderbird, and all of them have exactly the same specifications. They are all @hotmail.com. They have the same server name (outlook.office365.com), same port number, same connection security, same authentication method (0Auth2) and same Imap default release code. Never had a problem. Then on July 10th just one of them stopped opening and a message window appeared saying that authentication was OK but it wasn't able to connect. The other two continue to open as before. Any idea on how to rectify this, please.
creator: johnsweetensen

title: Phone Number Not Displaying on Google Maps – Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi
content:
Dear Google Support Team,

I am writing to report an issue regarding my business listing for Rama Rehab (website: https://www.ramarehab.com). Despite being listed as a Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi, my official contact phone number is currently not appearing on Google Maps.

This issue is impacting our ability to serve patients and families seeking reliable rehabilitation services in Delhi. Many individuals rely on our contact details to reach out for help, and the absence of our phone number is causing serious inconvenience.

Please look into this matter as soon as possible and help in updating or restoring our correct contact number on Google Maps.

Thank you for your support and cooperation.

Best regards, Rama Rehab Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi Website: https://www.ramarehab.com
creator: roarwellnessrama

title: Phone Number Not Showing on Google Maps for Nasha Mukti Kendra in Delhi
content:
Dear Google Business Support Team,

I am writing to report an issue regarding my business listing for Rama Rehab, a trusted Nasha Mukti Kendra in Delhi, with the official website https://www.ramarehab.com.

Currently, our business phone number is not visible on Google Maps, which is severely affecting our ability to connect with people who are seeking urgent help for addiction recovery. Our center provides critical de-addiction services, and it is essential that those in need can easily reach us through our contact number.

I kindly request your team to review and resolve this issue as soon as possible by displaying our correct phone number on our Google Maps listing.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Best regards, Rama Rehab Nasha Mukti Kendra in Delhi Website: https://www.ramarehab.com
creator: roarwellnessrama

title: Non si riesce a creare nuove mail
content: Buongiorno, da stamane, dopo che Thunderbird il giorno precedente si è aggiornato alla Version 141.0 Released July 22, 2025, cliccando sul tasto "Scrivi" o con il comando Ctrl+N non è più possibile creare nuove mail. Le impostazioni PO3 ed SMTP non sono cambiate, infatti si riesce a scaricare la posta e facendo "Rispondi" ad un messaggio ricevuto si riesce ad inviare la mail. Qualcuno ha problemi del genere o riesce a darmi indicazioni su cosa fare? Grazie in anticipo
creator: g.pagani

title: No new messages after opening Thunderbird
content:
No new messages after opening Thunderbird

Since yesterday (24/07/2025), when I open Thunderbird, I don't see new messages. I can see the number of new messages, but no new headers. I didn't have this problem before. When I access my account through a browser, there are new messages that Thunderbird doesn't see. I have version 140.1.0. I have the message threads enabled - All.

Polish/Polski Brak nowych wiadomości po otwarciu Thunderbirda Od wczoraj (24-07-2025) po otwarciu Thunderbird - nie widzę nowych wiadomości, widać liczbę nowych wiadomości, ale brak nowych nagłówków. Wcześniej nie miałem tego problemu. Jak wchodzę na konto przez przeglądarkę, są tam nowe wiadomości, które nie widzi Thunderbird. Mam wersję 140.1.0. Mam włączone odnośnie wiadomości - Wątki - Wszystkie.
creator: ADAM.WITOLD.NOWICKI

title: Thunderbird 140.x/141.0  High CPU load and crash when exiting on MacOS 10.15.7.
content:
Hello! I used Thunderbird on a MacBook Pro with MacOS Catalina 10.15.7. No problems for years up to version 139.x. Now, starting with version 140.x, high CPU load and crash when exiting the Thunderbird. App Error also occurs with a completely new MacOS 10.15.7. Installation only with Thunderbird 141.0 and empty profile.

Does anyone have any tips?

I would like to continue using Thunderbird without any changes.

Best regards, Robert, Austria.
creator: wuehrer

title: Postvak alleen ongelezen berichten in beeld
content:
Goedenmorgen,

In mijn postvak in, staan alleen nog maar de ongelezen berichten. De gelezen berichten zijn niet meer in beeld of ergens te vinden. Wel komt een gelezen bericht tevoorschijn als ik er op zoek in de zoekbalk. Heb online tips als filters checken etc. uitgevoerd, maar daar staan verder geen gekke dingen ingesteld. Hoor graag of iemand mij verder kan helpen, ofdat ik hem weer opnieuw moet installeren. Een ander mailaccount heeft wel gewoon de mogelijkheid om naar beneden te scrollen en alle gelezen berichten ook in te zien.

Alvast bedankt voor het meedenken!

Groeten Tom
creator: Home26

title: cannot disable autosave
content: I'm running Thunderbird 139.0 on Windows 11. I would like it so TB only saves an email to my sent folder when requested. Currently, it always saves every email to the sent folder. I have "Place a copy" disabled in "Copies & Folders" under Account Settings. I had this same problem running TB 141. I had to revert to 139 due to a different problem I was having (discussion for a different post). Any suggestions what else I need to do?
